mapper.select: SELECT cno FROM p_cls_order p , p_cls_ttab pt where p.ctno = pt.ctno GROUP BY cno ORDER BY COUNT(p.ctno) DESC LIMIT 6

select pco.ono, pco.meno, pco.time, pco.tot_pric, pco.payopt, pco.ctno, pc.cno as ccno, pc.titl as ctitl, pc.cfile as cfile, pm2.nick as mentornick, pct.date, pct.stime, pc.time as ctime, pcf.fname, pmg.mtname as mtnm from p_mete as pm inner join p_cls_order as pco inner join p_cls_ttab as pct inner join p_cls as pc inner join p_mtag as pmg inner join p_cls_file as pcf inner join p_meto as po inner join p_mete as pm2
on pm.meno = pco.meno and pco.ctno = pct.ctno and pct.cno = pc.cno and pc.cno = pcf.cno and pc.mtno = pmg.mtno and pc.mono = po.mono and po.mono = pm2.meno where pm.meno = #{meno} group by pc.cno order by pcf.cfno desc limit #{rowNo},#{size};

select * from( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum, mtag.mtname, cls.titl, mete.nick nick, mete2.nick nick2, cls.pric, ttab.date, ttab.stime, mete.name name1, mete2.name name2, mete2.phone, paydt, corder.ono
from p_cls_order as corder inner join p_cls_ttab as ttab inner join p_cls as cls inner join p_mtag as mtag inner join p_mete as mete inner join p_mete as mete2 on corder.ctno = ttab.ctno and ttab.cno = cls.cno and cls.mtno = mtag.mtno and corder.meno = mete.meno and mete2.meno = cls.mono ,(select @rownum:=0)r order by ono asc )as a where rnum limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize};

select count(*) from p_mete as pm inner join p_cls_order as pco on pm.meno = pco.meno inner join p_cls_ttab as pct on pco.ctno = pct.ctno inner join p_cls as pc on pct.cno = pc.cno where pc.cno=#{no} AND pm.meno =#{meno};

select pco.meno from p_mete as pm inner join p_cls_order as pco on pm.meno = pco.meno inner join p_cls_ttab as pct on pco.ctno = pct.ctno inner join p_cls as pc on pct.cno = pc.cno where pc.cno= #{no}

select count(*) from p_cls_order as corder inner join p_cls_ttab as ttab inner join p_cls as cls inner join p_mtag as mtag inner join p_mete as mete inner join p_mete as mete2 on corder.ctno = ttab.ctno and ttab.cno = cls.cno and cls.mtno = mtag.mtno and corder.meno = mete.meno and mete2.meno = cls.mono order by ono asc
